blt_mod_blt_outdated: This mod requires BLT version $param; or higher
blt_update_dll_text:
An update is available to the BLT DLL, you will need to update this yourself by downloading and installing it again from the website.

Please update ASAP as this is a critical update which may fix crashes with your game.
blt_checking_updates_help: Checking for updates to your mods, please wait...
blt_checking_updates_required_help: Updates are available for your mods, visit the download manager to update them!
blt_checking_updates_none_required_help: None of your mods need updating!
blt_mods_manager_important_help: Go to the Mods Manager to update?
blt_mod_failed_load: Failed to load, see why in 'more information'
blt_no_change_desc: You already have the latest version of the mod assets installed!
blt_farewell_rblt_text: Due to the release of RAID-SuperBLT, RaidBLT wont be developed any further and all future development effort will be put into RAID-SuperBLT! Please read the installation instructions on the RAID-SuperBLT page carefully.
